Utilities classes

Utilities classes are helpers css classes that used to apply instant styles, In sparkUI we have many utilities divided to following types

Typography Utilities Classes

class implementation
.u-font--xsuper
.u-font--super
.u-font--xlarge
.u-font--large
.u-font--medium
.u-font--small
.u-font--xsmall

Text alignment utilities classes

class usage
.u-text--left text-align:left
.u-text--center text-align:center
.u-text--right text-align:right

Font weight utilities classes

class usage
.u-font--bold font-weight:700
.u-font--semibold font-weight:600
.u-font--normal font-weight:400

Text direction utilities classes

class Usage
.u-direction--rtl direction:rtl
.u-direction--ltr direction:ltr

.u-text--break-all | word-break:break-all .u-text--break-word | word-break:break-word

.u-text--trim | white-space:nowrap .u-text--capitalize | text-transform:capitalize
